about_the_game:
The Mysterious Man has visited Portia once again! The eccentric businessman spends his time traveling the world while collecting fashionable clothes from different cities. During his recent visit to Portia, he decided to gift several residents new, top of the line, trendy outfits!

In this pack you will receive 8 alternative outfits for both the male and female playing characters!
